theInterloper:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theInterloper:StoneHearth.NAME: Stone Hearth
theInterloper:StoneHearth.FLAVOR: Pull up a chair by the hearth!
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click once per fight to gain 1 [E] .

theInterloper:RefactoringTask.NAME: Refactoring Task
theInterloper:RefactoringTask.FLAVOR: THIS time it will be so much better.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you play it, you have 1/4 chance to make it worse and 3/4 to make it better.
